TopicTitle: What mods can help with cargo bay drag bugs?

Articles.Content:
Parts inside stock and modded cargo bays sometimes generate full drag as if they weren't inside the bay. FAR is the only mod that I know can improve this behavior.

Does anyone know of other mods that work with stock aerodynamics?

I can imagine a partial cheat mod that adds a new decoupler where all parts beyond the decoupler become dragless until decoupled. Payload would be free from drag at launch, and would start getting drag again as soon as it's released. I have no idea if that's even possible.
